## WHO-Databrew Arbovirus survey collaboration

This is a repository for the WHO Geneva collaboration with Databrew on the Global Arbovirus Survey. More details to come soon.

## Developer instructions

- Clone this repository  
- Populate the `data` folder with data from the WHO
- Knit `analyze.Rmd`

## Data fields

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
library(readxl)
df <- read_excel('data/Dummy data subset_375147_16 June.xlsx')
cat(paste0(paste0('- ', names(df)), collapse = '\n'))
```
